revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - Accept. This is a valid Leiden+ for the text as reedited in PSI XV 1525. Line 1: το̣ῖ̣c -> το̣ῖ̣ς; add reg for ἐγκτήσεων; add [.?] at the end (?). Line 3, add [.?] at the end ("mese imprecisabile" in the comment). Line 5, [.?] -> [.?][ ὡς]. Line 10: ἀ[γορα]στῶν -> ἀγ[ορα]στῶν. Line 11: αὐ̣[τῷ ][ προυκηρύχθη,] -> αὐ̣[τῷ προυκηρύχθη,]. Line 12: -> αὐ[τοῦ πόρου ἐπὶ]. Line 15: (κώ(μῃ)) -> (κώμ(ῃ)). Line 18: δ̣όντος ἐ̣[κυρώθησαν] -> δ̣όντος, ἐ̣[κυρώθησαν ][.?]. Lines 20 and 21: τοῦ] -> τοῦ ][.?]. Line 23, add numtag for δύο.

Vote - AcceptText - Accept. Lin6 <#ξ=60#> => <#.1=#> (not a number but a placeholder for number in lacuna) ; 15=> δέ· ; 16=> [.?] [τῷ] ; 18=> ἐ̣[κυρώθησαν] [.?] right? ; 20=> τοῦ] [.?] . del lin25 ; Finalizer please note: The beginning of the letter on the verso has (correctly) been removed here. When renaming please retain dummy header and then in that dummy header add back the verso and its text: <S=.grc<D=.r<= 1. [.?]λλας Ἀπολλωνίῳ χα[ίρειν] [.?]2. lost.?lin =>=D>
Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/psi.congr.xi;;8' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/psi;15;1525'
Automated transfer of accents across reg-orig pairs
batch converted all tei:sic to tei:orig and tei:corr to tei:reg
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
